common.auto: Automated message. Please do not reply!
withdrawal_confirmation.title: Nami Exchange - Withdrawal confirmation
withdrawal_confirmation.text_02: Someone has just made a withdrawal from your account ({email})
withdrawal_confirmation.text_06: Enter this 6-digits to verify that withdrawal
withdrawal_confirmation.text_07: If this action isn't yours, please update your password, check your login devices and contact us immediately at support@nami.exchange.
footer.download: Download Nami Exchange app on the App Store and Google Play.
